text:
The class org.apache.jorphan.collections.Data contains multiple references to 
the Java 1.4 String.split(String regex) method (lines 520, 524).  As a result, 
JMeter will not compile using java versions prior to 1.4 and running JMeter on 
a version of java prior to 1.4 is risky.

Ideally, these references would be removed in favor of JMeterUtils.split
(String, String) or some other code.  Alternatively, the documentation should 
be updated to accurately reflect the version of java used to compile the 
distributions.
creator: patrick_conant@yahoo.com
